critique: I need to evaluate the emotions that the President wants to elicit with this order. The order is about combating COVID-19 and securing necessary supplies. The primary emotions the President likely wants to elicit are joy (relief that the government is taking action), and perhaps some fear (to ensure compliance and understanding of the severity), but also to reduce fear by showing action is being taken. There might be some sadness acknowledged due to the pandemic's impact, but the focus is on solutions. Disgust and surprise are less relevant here. I will start with initial scores and then revise them after further consideration.
